member.name: T:System.Threading.Tasks.Sync
member.summary: Helper class to properly wait for async tasks

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.Sync.Run``1(System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task{``0}})
member.summary: Run an async function synchronously and return the result

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.InstantHandleAttribute
member.summary: Tells the code analysis engine if the parameter is completely handled when the invoked method is on stack. If the parameter is a delegate, indicates that delegate is executed while the method is executed. If the parameter is an enumerable, indicates that it is enumerated while the method is executed.
